duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive XSIAM revenue across all segments by leveraging consultative selling skills to initiate executive relationships with prospective customers and sponsors.
Understand the competitive landscape and customer needs in the Security Operations Center, demonstrating the business value of XSIAM and creating customer-specific proposals and business cases.
Collaborate across sales teams within a matrix environment, providing thought leadership and leading cross functional engagement teams.
Deliver influential presentations, coach teams, lead negotiations, and guide customers towards improved security practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
